text: The acronym NLD may refer to: * National League for Democracy, a political party in Myanmar (Burma) * National League for Democracy (Tanzania), a political party in Tanzania * Necrobiosis lipoidica diabeticorum, a skin disorder * Nonverbal learning disorder * Novell Linux Desktop * North London derby * Quetzalcóatl International Airport (IATA code NLD), in Nuevo Laredo, Tamaulipas, Mexico * The Netherlands, by ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code
title: NLD
